name: ArtisticControl
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jame 2020 with the theme Out of Control.

You Got A Log! You Got A Chainsaw! Time for your Artistic Control! (just don't let it get out of control!) Controls
  • Mouse - Move chainsaw
  • WASD - Rotate view
  • LMB - Cut
  • R - Restart
Credits

Leonid Dudakov (@DetectiveLosos) - programming, log cutting, music

Alexander Kopiy (@kopiy_that) - vfx, 3d art

Annie Owl (@owl_annie) - programming, chainsaw flailing
